filter_ads.views module¶

class filter_ads.views.FilterView(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: rest_framework.views.APIView

This class performs filtering opertion based on some criterias such as sale_type, price, no of bedrooms, no of bathrooms, area of the property, posted date e.t.c. :param APIView: APIView :type APIView: url response

permission_classes = (<class 'rest_framework.permissions.AllowAny'>,)¶
post(request, format=None)[source]¶

This function allows to post request filtered listings.

Parameters

  • request (object) – request

  • format (optional) – defaults to None

Returns

query set of filtered listings

json
